<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Blessing of the Sun Gods](/Feats.aspx?ID=3410) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Bright Lion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=129)

**Prerequisites**
[Bright Lion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2172)

</column>

---

The [Old Sun Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=19) share their power with you. Select the [ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=1), [cities](/Domains.aspx?ID=3), [darkness](/Domains.aspx?ID=6), [dreams](/Domains.aspx?ID=9), [family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=13), [freedom](/Domains.aspx?ID=14), [healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15), [moon](/Domains.aspx?ID=21), [passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=25), or [sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=29) domain. You gain an initial domain spell for that domain. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can regain using the [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) activity to pray to the Old Sun Gods; if you already have a focus pool, increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. Your Bright Lion focus spells are divine spells; you become trained in divine spell attacks and spell DCs, using Charisma as your spellcasting ability score.

**Special** You can select this feat multiple times, selecting a different domain each time and gaining its domain spell.

<title level="2">Blessing of the Sun Gods leads to...</title>
[Greater Sun Blessing](/Feats.aspx?ID=3413)
name: Blessing of the Sun Gods
